articles.title: Noida Twin Towers Set For Demolition Blast, Area Evacuated: 10 Facts
articles.description: The Supertech twin towers in Noida are set to be demolished at 2.30 pm today by a massive explosion. The area has been evacuated and arrangements have been made to ensure that adjoining structures are not affected by the explosion
